title: Giving Attention to Krishna Is Better Quality of Service! | Sri Madhu Pandit Dasa | Soulful Japa
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.key_quote: Krishna's only business is to be with his devotees to be aware of his devotees, to show mercy to his devotees show love to his devotees
segments.summary: This segment explains that Krishna is always ready to receive our service and is fully present for his devotees, especially through the chanting of the Hare Krishna mantra.

segments.key_quote: If he embraces me, then there can be flow of sat, chitta, ananda, shakti, into him, to awaken him, his consciousness.
segments.summary: This segment emphasizes the importance of attentive chanting, comparing it to a piece of iron in a fire, and how Krishna is pleased when devotees chant with focus, leading to liberation.

segments.key_quote: Krishna is physically before you. You can embrace Him body to body with your arms around Him. Now also you can embrace Him, but you have to embrace Him on the same time, him with your attention.
segments.summary: This segment explains that Krishna is pleased when devotees advance in Krishna consciousness by remembering him more and more, and that we can embrace Krishna through attentive chanting, just as iron embraces fire.

segments.key_quote: जपा is a highly mystical process, for instance, to have शद्धा, that this is a reservoir of सच्चिदानन्दा
segments.summary: This segment discusses realizing one's true nature beyond the body and describes japa as a mystical process that connects us to the reservoir of eternity, knowledge, and bliss.

segments.key_quote: तो इसलिए, minimum chanting, attention से सुनना है, साथ साथ में श्रद्धा भी वना है, कि ये सच्चिदान की समुद्र है, कृष्णा है, परम कृपालू है, और मुझे उसका association चाहिए।
segments.summary: This segment emphasizes the importance of chanting attentively with faith, seeking association with Krishna, and hearing every word of the mantra to enter the fire of spiritual realization.
